title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.1 - Actuarial computation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.1 - Actuarial computation

State Regulations

When making an award under the mandatory provisions of
section
27
of
the Workers' Compensation Law, the insurance carrier shall be directed to pay
to the claimant, or in death cases to the dependents, the compensation that has
accrued to the date of the award and three biweeklies thereafter. The actuary, when computing the amount to be paid into the aggregate trust fund, shall
assume such payments have been made by the carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
393.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
